website_summaries.verdict: A standard mud tire that offers a good blend of off-road/mud and highway performance.
pros: Comes with a tread pattern that is meant to offer more surface area to float above the mud
Treads are thinner than most to promote better performance and fuel efficiency on the highway
cons: Tire width produces more rolling resistance on highways at high speeds

customer_reviews.title: They are what you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tires look great and ride great every bit as good as the nittos I just took off except about $800 cheaper . I purchased based on the reviews . You will not be disappointed they are a great buy .
customer_reviews.author: Mr.P

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive looks combined with a smooth and quite ride.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mud terrain and I was a little worried that I would hate the ride and noise of these tires on my 2016 F-250. But for just a little over $200 per tire for a 10ply 35x12.5x20, I had to give them a try. I tell you so far they feel like they run smoother than my OEM Michelin tires. They do have a little more noise to them but nothing too bad for such an aggressive looking tire. These along with my new 20" Method wheels has totally transformed the look of my truck. Only time will tell how long they will last but I may have found my new favorite tire.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Byers

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Been running these since January 2017 it’s now almost July 2018 tires wear great on my lifted 2005 Cummins just as good as the nitto trails I used to run you won’t be up set I got hit on the rear end by a guy doing about 90 on the interstate it destroyed my wheel and I drove about 2 miles on it trying to catch him tire still is good 10k miles later
customer_reviews.author: dan seel

customer_reviews.title: ... had them installed awhile now and have been very pleased. These are almost as quiet an my ATs ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I purchased these because the price was so reasonable but have had them installed awhile now and have been very pleased. These are almost as quiet an my ATs and have much better grip on my wife's tuned up Ram 2500 4x4 Cummins. Made by Cooper Tire so I guess I should not have been surprised.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cope

customer_reviews.title: Have these on my Silverado 1500. 35x12. 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: Have these on my Silverado 1500. 35x12.50 20. Just replaced my last set after 46000 miles, still had some life left.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Segura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tires solely based off of the other Amazon reviews and so far I'm very impressed! I have a 2006 Ford F-250 Super Duty long bed with stock 20" rims that I put these tires on. Put about 200 miles on them before loading up a K5 Blazer on a trailer and hauling it about 1500 miles. I had zero problems and these tires are actually pretty quiet, especially compared to Nitto Mud Grapplers that I had years ago. For the price, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Pooler

customer_reviews.title: Tires are great... Sears installation...  NOT SO MUCH...
customer_reviews.text: Tires are great looking - no issues with the tires... However the Sears installation SUCKED! (@ Lakewood CO location) They kept talking about how big they are (the Tires)... If they are Too big, don't offer to install them I say... Any way after the 5 hours installation... I was so late I didn't stop to question the low air sensor that was now alerting. Went home tried putting air in it and the entire valve stem popped out.... NICE! would not recommend using the Sears installation... at least for "Big Tires" 35X12.50x20... will never go there again for anything personally - horrible work... Headed to a real tire place in the am...
customer_reviews.author: Todd Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tires, great price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the old tires on my Super Duty with these. Great quality tires for around 900.00, versus the 1840.00 I spent last time. I saved around 1000.00. There was a difference of about 100.00 on the last ones versus these because I mounted and balanced these myself, but still, I saved the equivalent of at least 800.00. I have Mastercraft tires on both trucks, and both of our cars. They're great quality, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: TG RH

customer_reviews.title: Great tires absolutely love how quiet and comfortable the ride ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tires absolutely love how quiet and comfortable the ride is on these tires. Was worried about the road noise since they're Mud Tires but its little to none very quiet even at highway speeds. Not to mention how great they look, very aggressive and have gotten plenty of compliments on how they look. Haven't had them long enough to rate the wear but update. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires! These babies are quiet on the highway, wear well (slowly) & look great! I can't however speak about muddability because i have them on my "pavement princess." Disregard the pic in Amazon. There is no white lettering on these tires.
customer_reviews.author: alatexa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look and fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can get exactly what I'm looking for on amazon anytime! I was looking for these for my 2013 dodge ram 1500 and couldn't find a more decent price. They look and fit so great.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I usally get just over 50000 on these tire if rotating every 5000 on an 8000lb powerstroke truck. Great traction on and off road with little noise until there shot like all knobby tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wearing quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for three months to post a review just so I could see the wear on them! And it’s not holding up well, it is loud which is to be expected! But the ride is terrible, but they are wearing quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sharice Perkins

customer_reviews.title: High quality tires
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tires, currently have 6k miles on them and they show zero signs of wear. Great in deep snow, mud and rain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires are probably the best bang for your buck! I was able to have the shop balance these without any problems. They are much quieter than I thought
customer_reviews.author: Kedmonds

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Not real loud hoping to get 96,000 like the last set
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love these tires
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires. I get complements all of the time. They look great and a functional. Pretty quiet for a mud tire. You can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome/Last a longtime.
customer_reviews.text: These tires are awesome. They really look good on the Truck also and hold up well for many miles as I had these on originally then had to replace two due to a nail in the sidewall
customer_reviews.author: TriGuy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not loud on the road. Super good in the snow! And wear really evenly
customer_reviews.author: Zen J Standley

customer_reviews.title: Tread looks awesome. Put about 3000 miles on them so far
customer_reviews.text: Tread looks awesome. Put about 3000 miles on them so far. They are quiet and have excellent traction in snow, rain, and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Good performance off road
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great on and off the road. They dig really well off road and are pretty quite on the road. Smooth ride, all took 4oz to valence. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dylan G.

customer_reviews.title: 12,000 mile review
customer_reviews.text: Tread depth is at 16/32's, not bad when they started at 20/32's considering it's a mud tire. Tire noise at highway speeds is honestly not too bad. Overall I'm pretty happy with the tires except for the fact that they went up $60 from when I ordered them. You can find them cheaper on other website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tires, balanced very well and not too much ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tires, balanced very well and not too much road noise. Only have 3k miles on them but they seem to be wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Lance DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just had these installed and they ride very smooth. So far I love these tires for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Husband favorite
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with these tires. The noise the old tires made while we were driving is now gone thanks to these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Mastin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the tires I just made 55000 miles did great on and off the road very good chance of buying these again the price is good and the quality is good
customer_reviews.author: oft13

customer_reviews.title: Great wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tire for someone that spends most time on the road. I put 40K on mine, not sure how many miles the original owner had on them. They were far from new when I got the truck.
customer_reviews.author: mike broomfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Bulky, aggressive looking tires for a great price. After 2 months of driving, they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tires almost 4 years ago and they have been great. Getting ready to purchase 4 more. They currently have 37,000 miles on them and only rotated them 3-4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires, read a lot of reviews and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires, read a lot of reviews and all said that they were quite. These tires are super quiet. Ride great and get very good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Siems

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Quiet Tires
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy so far with these tires! They are so quiet and took very little weight to balance. I cannot speak for how long they will last, but I can say that they are great MT tires at a great price! I couldn’t be more happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....I only have 4000 miles on them. So we will see... reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy page

customer_reviews.title: Mastercradt
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires! Look like a mud tire and ride like an all terrain. Quiet on the highway and dont bounce like lots of others.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look great. For the price of these tires I believe they deserve 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew walker

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get white letters like the photo....
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got the white letter tires like in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyo

customer_reviews.title: Not good on icey snowy roads at all
customer_reviews.text: I have these tires on my Ford F250 and after a 4000 mile road trip they are half gone... Not good on icey snowy roads at all... Looks cool. Use it in the summer...
customer_reviews.author: SeniorHun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great Have had them for 2months And over 6000 miles Wearing evenly and look great
customer_reviews.author: victor partida

customer_reviews.title: Great f**king tires man!
customer_reviews.text: Great mud tires for the price. All reviews i've read about these were 4 or 5 star reviews.. says they wear well, and last a long time. 275 for tires that look like some terra grapplers that are over 400 is a steal. Very happy with my order. Had them for about 3 months now and nothing but good things to say. They are not loud and they do great in rain and mud. Good stuff, i'd buy them again.. i will when i need new ones if they're the same price!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Pietryg

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my jeep's 5th spare tire so I cant comment on how it actually rides on the road. however it looks similar in quality to the 4 Nitto tires I have on the jeep now and its about 2/3 the price of the Nitto's so Id definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Geovanny

customer_reviews.title: These tires are awesome. You cannot beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These tires are awesome. You cannot beat the price, and the look and functionality. Dig great, grip well, and clean well. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

product_meta.title: Mastercraft Courser MXT Mud Terrain Radial Tire - 35/125R20 121Q
product_meta.description: The Courser MXT is an extreme off-road mud terrain tire perfect for light truck owners and extreme off-roaders seeking aggressive off-road traction and excellent handling on the highway. The MXT sports an attractive side biter design and wide, deep tread grooves for superior off-road mud and snow traction performance.The amount of rubber on the road is optimized to provide excellent extreme terrain traction and enhanced driving feel while the aggressive, deep "side biter" design increases off-road traction, and sidewall abrasion resistance.The scallops provide a "mud-scoop" effect, for superior off-road traction. Traction edges on the alternating shoulder elements add additional biting edges for improved lateral grip. The wide grooves between the outer tread blocks allow the MXT to easily clean out, increasing grip for superior traction. Siping for increased wet traction on the highway also provides extra biting edges for enhanced off-road traction. Even at half worn, 80% of the MXT's sipes remain functional, providing for more consistent performance throughout the life of the tire.Specifications - Size Load Rating Diameter Cross Section Max Load Sidewall 35X12.50R20E34.6912.53195BW
feature_bullets: The unique noise minimizing tread block pattern utilizes wide, circumferential grooves that channel water away while providing excellent traction and grip. Your ride will look fine on a set of LX-NINE!
This product is not for sale in the state of Arkansas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
